title: Gnayiru Dhinagalin Lyrics Poovarasam Peepee Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Gnayiru Dhinagalin
Singer: Abhay Jothpurkar
Movie: Poovarasam Peepee
Lyrics:Â Halitha Shameem
Music: Aruldev

Gnayiru Dhinagalin, pozhudhu saayum podhu.
Yengi thaviththidum, manadhai enna solla.

Pandhu tholaindhaale
vandhu pogum azhugai.
unnai thozhaithu vittu
naan enna seiven.

Nee neram mangaaa
ninaivaaga endrum iruppaaye.
Sikkanamaaga kadhal seiyya
manam ariya villaye.

Nee vilaginaal
miga naan thaivppadhu
kulirnaal porvai
anbin paarvai.

Naam nesikka vegunaal , kaliyananum
Kuraimaadhaa kuzhandhai
koorum agangai..

Marakandai oondri vaithaen
ennulle mella valarave.
Tharangetta ooril unnai
karam konde naan kaappen.
Naatkal pogattum.
